whales.name: Rainbow Warrior
whales.description: They will move over the Earth like a great whirling Rainbow.

whales.name: Hvaldimir
whales.description: I just wanted to play.

whales.name: Cetus
whales.description: A belly full of diatoms

whales.name: Tohora
whales.description: Turn your face toward the sun and the shadows will fall behind you.

whales.name: Starshine
whales.description: By the light of the moon!

whales.name: Phiomicetus
whales.description: Whalez these days ain't what they used to be.

whales.name: Cetaceous Prime
whales.description: Freedom is the right of all sentient beings.

whales.name: Lola
whales.description: Humanity has explored 5% of the ocean. I have explored all of it.

whales.name: GNARwhale
whales.description: Behold the GNAR.

whales.name: Kujira
whales.description: A frog in a well knows nothing of the sea.

whales.name: Gyian
whales.description: Remember your kin.

whales.name: Namu
whales.description: Meow.

whales.name: Snoobs
whales.description: Moonlit migration, giants swimming to shelter, warmer waters soon.

whales.name: General Ambergris
whales.description: The battle of the 4 million whales has begun.

whales.name: The Notorious W.A.L.
whales.description: Birthdays was the worst days, now we sip diatoms when we thirsty.

whales.name: Serafina
whales.description: Our character isn't defined by the battles we win or lose, but by the battles we dare to fight.

whales.name: Lil Zap!
whales.description: What goes around comes around like a hool-a-poop.

whales.name: Stargrazer
whales.description: The starry vault of heaven is in truth the open book of cosmic projection.

whales.name: Zebroar
whales.description: Everything you see exists together in a delicate balance.

whales.name: Sprinklez
whales.description: Donut stop believing.

whales.name: Goldfin
whales.description: The golden rule is rule by Goldfin.

whales.name: Sandor of the Abyss
whales.description: I need a spare heart to feel all the things I feel.

whales.name: Iron Cloud
whales.description: And they will know us by the trail of iron, phosphorous and nitrogen rich s&*t.

whales.name: Keiko
whales.description: I've always been a better rule breaker than rule maker.

whales.name: Vinko
whales.description: Whale pumpin' 24/7.

whales.name: Tesselator
whales.description: You have everything needed for the extravagant journey that is your life.

whales.name: Bernardus
whales.description: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.

whales.name: Dezirindra
whales.description: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.

whales.name: Whalefall
whales.description: From my rotting body, flowers shall grow and I am in them and that is eternity.

whales.name: Riptide
whales.description: Time is the substance from which I am made.

whales.name: Moby Crypt
whales.description: I am past scorching not easily can’st thou scorch a scar.

whales.name: Kaja
whales.description: The city is not a concrete jungle, it is a human zoo.

whales.name: Stasiz
whales.description: Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end.

whales.name: Brijesha
whales.description: Happiness is a state of mind, that has nothing to do with the external world.

whales.name: Marley
whales.description: If I was educated, I would be a damn fool.

whales.name: Dragan
whales.description: Bring it on.

whales.name: Kriller
whales.description: Never twist the throttle with your ego.

whales.name: Deadwhale
whales.description: Everything goes full circle with whale songs.

whales.name: Jinky
whales.description: I'm just here for the cotton candy.

whales.name: Nano
whales.description: All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others.

whales.name: Monstro
whales.description: Whosoever is delighted in solitude is either a wild beast or a god.

whales.name: Beast of the Brine
whales.description: But in the end it's only a passing thing, this shadow; even darkness must pass.

whales.name: Keavy
whales.description: Love the art in yourself and not yourself in the art.

whales.name: Typhoon Timmy
whales.description: The storm is an artist, the rainbow is its masterpiece.

whales.name: Ralf
whales.description: There is no new wave, only the sea.

whales.name: Krillby
whales.description: The sea does not like to be restrained.

whales.name: Lammert Kelpworthy
whales.description: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.

whales.name: Frank
whales.description: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.

whales.name: Aggaraza
whales.description: Let the waves carry you where the light can not.

whales.name: Frits Glorygale
whales.description: A rising tide lifts all boats.
